The basic idea is you pick your starch (4 or 5 types of noodles or rice) and then your protein and veggies and then your sauce and they wok it up then and there. It takes less than 5 minutes from the time you order till you get your take away container. There is some counter space for eating in. It's a fast Asian food place more or less. And, sometimes we all need something other than tapas and paella. Located in the heart of the popular / touristy part of La Ramblas.
